featured.text: It is intended for slim, fast people.
When the Amazons reach the nest of their intended victims, a fierce battle may take place.
The success of the park is exactly what Morgan intended to achieve.
In one study, nearly 600 children from kindergarten to sixth grade took part in a nutrition curriculum intended to get them to eat more vegetables and whole grains.

other.text: This article about fantasy literature is intended to __________.
Many believe that the aliens are here to help us, while others hold that the aliens intend us __(39)__.
They were prized possessions made of expensive materials intended to impress guests.
According to the author, the second example is intended to (A) express opinions about seashells.
The design was intended to look as shiny and smooth as velvet.

definition.en_def: To have a plan or purpose in mind.
definition.example: I intend to finish my homework before dinner.
